alert.note: Alert for Taliaferro; Wilkes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 26 at 1:01PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Taliaferro and Wilkes Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 100 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Tignall to near Celeste to Lyneville, and moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Washington, Tignall, Rayle, Ficklin, Delhi, Lundberg, Metasville, Floral Hill, Holliday Park, Aonia, Newtown, Danburg, Rocky Creek Fire Dept., Celeste, Lyneville and Carters Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
